info.task: navigate backwards to a heading inside a complementary landmark
info.title: Navigate backwards to a heading inside a complementary landmark in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterComplementary
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the complementary landmark
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the complementary landmark
testPageDocument.getElementById('afterlink').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Landmarks' heading.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Landmarks' heading.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, exit Forms Mode to activate the Virtual Cursor by pressing Escape.

assertions.expectation: Name of the heading, 'Landmarks', is conveyed
